summary: Iteration 26 Testing Complete - Global Download Queue Indicator feature fully verified. All 7 test cases PASSED. Download All button works, individual download buttons work, queue indicator shows progress (completed/total), indicator persists across page navigation, queue can be expanded to show individual items with progress bars.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: App.js correctly imports and wraps app with DownloadQueueProvider (lines 8, 61)
PASS: App.js renders DownloadQueueIndicator globally at line 65 (inside Router but outside Routes)
PASS: DiscoverPage.js has Download All button with data-testid='download-all-btn' (line 273)
PASS: DiscoverPage.js has individual download buttons with data-testid='download-podcast-{id}' (line 367)
PASS: DownloadQueueContext.js properly manages queue state with addToQueue, addSingleToQueue, clearCompleted, clearAll
PASS: DownloadQueueIndicator.js shows progress (completed/total), pending count, and overall percentage
PASS: DownloadQueueIndicator.js is expandable to show individual download items with progress bars
PASS: audioCache.js downloadAndCacheAudio function properly stores audio blobs in IndexedDB
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click 'Oya, Play' button on landing page
seed_data_creation: None - podcasts are curated in backend with audio URLs from soundhelix.com
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 26 tested Global Download Queue Indicator feature: (1) Download All button on Discover page - WORKING (queues all uncached podcasts), (2) Individual podcast download buttons - WORKING (adds single podcast to queue), (3) Queue indicator appears when downloading - WORKING (shows at bottom-right), (4) Progress tracking - WORKING (shows completed/total count and percentage), (5) Navigation persistence - WORKING (indicator persists on FEED, OFFLINE pages), (6) Expandable queue - WORKING (click to expand, shows individual items with progress bars), (7) Clear buttons - WORKING (CLEAR_COMPLETED and CLEAR_ALL visible in expanded view). Note: IndexedDB cache is browser-session specific, so cached items may not persist between automation sessions.

download_all_button.notes: Download All button visible on Discover page with data-testid='download-all-btn'. Clicking it queues all 6 podcasts for download.

individual_download_buttons.notes: 6 individual download buttons found with data-testid='download-podcast-{id}'. Each button adds single podcast to queue.

queue_indicator_appearance.notes: Queue indicator appears at bottom-right when downloads start. Shows 'DOWNLOADING...' status with spinning icon.

progress_tracking.notes: Queue indicator shows completed/total count (e.g., '2/6'), pending count (e.g., '5 PENDING'), and overall percentage (e.g., '33%').

navigation_persistence.notes: Queue indicator persists when navigating from Discover to FEED to OFFLINE pages. Progress continues updating across pages.

expandable_queue.notes: Clicking queue indicator expands it to show individual download items with title, status icon, and progress bar.

clear_buttons.notes: Expanded queue shows CLEAR_COMPLETED and CLEAR_ALL buttons for queue management.

mocked_data_note: MOCKED: Dubawa fact-check API uses simulated responses based on story_id hash
